channel.title: Disable Yell command
channel.description: Hey, I tried to add a command that disables yell, but it didn't work, does anyone have a suggestion? :)

item.title: Disable Yell command
item.dc:creator: @Ferity Ferity
item.description:
@Ferity wrote:

You usually do not have to care about this, but I made my own yell command for me, so I do not have an annoying yell timer.
And yes, I tested this with another account and it does not work.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Kono-chan wrote:

[quote=“Ferity, post:14, topic:377743”]‘canYell’ is not added to the server, so it does not work.
I cannot copy & paste from my compiler.
But the errors are like this:

client.java9726. cannot find symbol symbol: Variable canYell location: class client canYell = false ^ [/quote]

[quote=“Newty, post:13, topic:377743”]Add the following:

public boolean canYell; [/quote]

item.title: Disable Yell command
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

Add the following:

public boolean canYell;

Add these commands:

if (command.startsWith("yelloff") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("ferity"))) {
canYell = false;
}

if (command.startsWith("yellon") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("ferity"))) {
canYell = true;
}

Delete your old yell command and add this:


if (command.startsWith("yell") && checkLog("true", "yell") && (!playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("ferity"))&& (!playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("elly"))  && !(muted) && command.length() > 4) {
if ((System.currentTimeMillis() - yellTimer >= 10000)) {
if (canYell) {
                String titles = "";
                                String titles2 = "";
                                String text = command.substring(5);
{
                                if (Wins >= 0)
                                {
                                titles = "Beginner";
                                }
                                if (Wins >= 50)
                                {
                                titles = "Prod";
                                }
                                if (Wins >= 100)
                                {
                                titles = "Pker";
                                }
                                if (Wins >= 150)
                                {
                                titles = "Kickass";
                                }
                                if (Wins >= 200)
                                {
                                titles = "Badass";
                                }
                                if (Wins >= 250)
                                {
                                titles = "Legit";
                                }
                                if (Wins >= 300)
                                {
                                titles = "Prodigy";
                                }
                                if (Wins >= 400)
                                {
                                titles = "Champion";
                                }
                                if (Wins >= 500)
                                {
                                titles = "Master";
                                }
                                if (Wins >= 600)
                                {
                                titles = "Grandmaster";
                                }
                                if (Wins >= 700)
                                {
                                titles = "Legend";
                                }
                                if (Wins >= 800)
                                {
                                titles = "God";
                                }
                                if (Wins >= 1500)
                                {
                                titles = "Beast";
                                }
                                if (Wins >= 2500)
                                {
                                titles = "Insane";
                                }
                                if (Wins >= 4000)
                                {
                                titles = "Pk Legend";
                                }
                                if (Wins >= 6000)
                                {
                                titles = "Kill farmer";
                                }
                                if (Wins >= 15000)
                                {
                                titles = "Assasin";
                                }
                                 if (donator == 1) {
                    titles2 = "Donator ";
                }
                                 if (playerRights == 1) {
                    titles2 = "Mod ";
                }
                if (playerRights == 2) {
                    titles2 = "Admin ";
                }
                                if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("flawless")) {
                    titles2 = "1337 ";
               }
                                if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("elly")) {
                    titles2 = "Owner ";
               }
                                if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("nova wain")) {
                    titles2 = "F-Mod ";
               }
                                if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("robby")) {
                    titles2 = "Mod ";
               }
                                if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("nimad")) {
                    titles2 = "F-Mod ";
               }
                                if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("ferity")) {
                    titles2 = " ";
               }
                                if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("linda")) {
                    titles2 = "Event Manager ";
               }
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("")) {
                    titles2 = "Co Owner ";
               }
                                yell("["+titles2 + titles + " " + playerName +"]:@dre@ "+ Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
                                yellTimer = System.currentTimeMillis();
}
} else {
sM("Yelling is currently disabled..");
}
} else {
sM("You must wait 10 seconds between yells!");
        }

}

Post back if it works.

EDIT: Changed the yell command, add my updated one.

Read full topic

item.title: Disable Yell command
item.dc:creator: @Ferity Ferity
item.description:
@Ferity wrote:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && checkLog(“true”, “yell”) && (!playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“ferity”))&& (!playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“elly”)) && !(muted) && command.length() > 4) {
if ((System.currentTimeMillis() - yellTimer >= 10000)) {
String titles = “”;
String titles2 = “”;
String text = command.substring(5);
{
if (Wins >= 0)
{
titles = “Beginner”;
}
if (Wins >= 50)
{
titles = “Prod”;
}
if (Wins >= 100)
{
titles = “Pker”;
}
if (Wins >= 150)
{
titles = “Kickass”;
}
if (Wins >= 200)
{
titles = “Badass”;
}
if (Wins >= 250)
{
titles = “Legit”;
}
if (Wins >= 300)
{
titles = “Prodigy”;
}
if (Wins >= 400)
{
titles = “Champion”;
}
if (Wins >= 500)
{
titles = “Master”;
}
if (Wins >= 600)
{
titles = “Grandmaster”;
}
if (Wins >= 700)
{
titles = “Legend”;
}
if (Wins >= 800)
{
titles = “God”;
}
if (Wins >= 1500)
{
titles = “Beast”;
}
if (Wins >= 2500)
{
titles = “Insane”;
}
if (Wins >= 4000)
{
titles = “Pk Legend”;
}
if (Wins >= 6000)
{
titles = “Kill farmer”;
}
if (Wins >= 15000)
{
titles = “Assasin”;
}
if (donator == 1) {
titles2 = "Donator ";
}
if (playerRights == 1) {
titles2 = "Mod ";
}
if (playerRights == 2) {
titles2 = "Admin ";
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“flawless”)) {
titles2 = "1337 ";
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“elly”)) {
titles2 = "Owner ";
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“nova wain”)) {
titles2 = "F-Mod ";
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“robby”)) {
titles2 = "Mod ";
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“nimad”)) {
titles2 = "F-Mod ";
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“ferity”)) {
titles2 = " “;
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“linda”)) {
titles2 = “Event Manager “;
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(””)) {
titles2 = “Co Owner “;
}
yell(”[”+titles2 + titles + " " + playerName +”]:@dre@ "+ Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
yellTimer = System.currentTimeMillis();
}
} else {
sM(“You must wait 10 seconds between yells!”);
}

}
[/code]

item.title: Disable Yell command
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“shadytheone, post:5, topic:377743”][code]
public int muted = 0;

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“yell/off”)) {
muted = 1;
//sendMessage(“Yell has been muted!”);
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“yell/on”)) {
muted = 0;
//sendMessage(“Yell has been turned back on!”);
}

// add this code beneath in your yell command.
if (muted = 1) {
return;
}
[/code]

Try this, just wrote something quick.[/quote]

BIGGEST FACEPALM IN EXSISTANCE This won’t work, it will simpy just mute the person who uses the command… sigh I sware you could could only use “return;” in a switch statement or a packet? customCommand is a method.

[quote=“why so serious, post:6, topic:377743”]1. Open client.java
2. Search “yell”
3. Delete command or make it player rights 3
Hope I helped?[/quote]

Thats not what he wants.

Read full topic
